main_definition: To be given or received something without any cost or payment.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Giving something for free of charge.
meanings_and_examples.example: The museum offered the first week's admission to its exhibits as gratis.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Receiving a service or benefit without having to pay.
meanings_and_examples.example: She was pleasantly surprised when her friend provided a ride home as a gratis favor.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Unpaid or voluntary work done for the sake of helping others, often by professionals.
meanings_and_examples.example: Many doctors and lawyers offer their time to provide legal counseling or healthcare services on a gratis basis in developing countries.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An event or opportunity that is provided without cost as part of promotional activities.
meanings_and_examples.example: The company hosted a free webinar about financial planning, offering it gratis to attract potential customers.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A term used in auctions when the seller agrees not to sell an item for any bid price and instead donates or gives it away.
meanings_and_examples.example: At the charity auction, the antique vase was sold gratis, with all proceeds going towards supporting local arts education.
